memberdef.name: AddAsChild

briefdescription.para: Attaches this particle onto some object. If null value is provided then the particle will be detached from the current parent.

simplesect.para: Unlike Particle, you are free to use AddChild/RemoveChild instead of this one if you know what you are doing

parameterdescription.para: Object Parent onto which this particle will be attached
vector Attachment position local to the parent (optional)
vector Orientation local to the parent (Pitch, Yawn, Roll in degrees) (Optional)
bool Force rotation to be in WS (Optional)

float The value to apply

float The value to sum

description.para: Settings to make the Particle wiggle

briefdescription.para: Makes the particle change direction by random_angle every random_interval seconds.

simplesect.para: This does not actually work on Particle with no parent, it should on ParticleSource

parameterdescription.para: float Will be the range [-random_angle, random_angle[ to wiggle between
float Will be the time range [0, random_interval] to wiggle next time

briefdescription.para: Stops randomized wiggle.
Randomizes a new orientation and applies it.

memberdef.name: CreateParticle

briefdescription.para: Create function.

parameterdescription.para: int Particle ID registered in ParticleList
vector Position of ParticleSource in LS (WS when no parent)
bool Whether to play immediately after creation (Optional)
Object Parent Object which will child the ParticleSource (Optional)
vector Orientation of ParticleSource in LS (WS when no parent) (Pitch, Yaw, Roll in degrees) (Optional)
bool Forces orientation to rotate relative to the world and not with the parent (Optional)
Class The owning instance for this particle (Optional)

simplesect.para: ParticleSource Created particle instance when successful

Class The owning instance for this particle (Optional)

ctor
dtor
Empty - Only needed for Particle.
Enables the particle to automatically clean up itself when ending or stopping.

simplesect.para: Is enabled by default (ALL)
Looping particles never end
ParticleSource belonging to a ParticleManager will ignore these

parameterdescription.para: ParticleAutoDestroyFlags Flags enabling when the particle should be auto destroyed

briefdescription.para: Disables the particle automatically cleaning up itself when ending or stopping.
Gets the currently set ParticleAutoDestroyFlags flags set on this ParticleSource.

simplesect.para: int Currently set ParticleAutoDestroyFlags flags set on this ParticleSource

briefdescription.para: Entity which has the particle instance as an ObjectComponent.

simplesect.para: Unfortunately the native methods are private and have a script wrapper This is because of backwards compatibility with the old Particle and to avoid confusion As we should continue to use Particle for consistency, as it is too deeply rooted in script Which means switching is no longer possible due to it being harmful for already existing mods Even though using the ParticleSource directly would be preferred

Some variables from Particle are invalid on this level, those marked DEPRECATED by Particle are still DEPRECATED here m_ParticleID; //!< INVALID - Use GetParticleID() instead m_Lifetime; //!< INVALID - No EOnFrame, so no use for it m_IsPlaying; //!< VALID - Set through events - IsParticlePlaying() is still better m_IsRepeat; //!< INVALID - Use IsRepeat() instead m_MarkedForDeletion; //!< INVALID - No EOnFrame, so no use for it Wiggle API variables are still used for Wiggle API m_ParentObject; //!< VALID - Set through events - Or use GetParticleParent() or GetParent() m_ParticleEffect; //!< VALID - Not in the same usage as Particle, as it will always be 'this', never null
